name: Desert Formula Car Racing
description: Real sport auto cars experience, Desert Formula Car Racing is one of the best newly formed 3D race and vehicle game on the off road track in all best racing games. Desert Formula Car Racing, has thunder high-speed, you can compete against other racing cars off the grid to get top on the track. If you like  racing games and challenges then this is a perfect Racing Game for you having High Quality 3d, Cool and fidelity Graphics. It is an addictive pixer game due to having Realistic Physics implemented in beautiful 3D environments with real track and real-time racing experience that kids and fans have to love and fond of drive alike .
